snippet: Senator Lindsey Graham said he wanted more information about a Libyan attack before confirming John O. Brennan as C.I.A. director and Chuck Hagel as defense secretary.
abstract: Republican Sen Lindsey Graham says he will  use a Senate custom known as a hold to stall the nominations of John O Brennan as CIA director and former Sen Chuck Hagel as Pentagon chief until the White House gives him a full description of Pres Obama’s actions during the attack on Sept 11, 2012, of  the United States compound in Benghazi, Libya.
lead_paragraph: Senator Lindsey Graham said he wanted more information about a Libyan attack before confirming John O. Brennan as C.I.A. director and Chuck Hagel as defense secretary.

headline.seo: Republican Threatens to Block Hagel and Brennan
headline.main: Republican Threatens to Block Pentagon and C.I.A. Nominees
headline.print_headline: Republican Threatens to Block Pentagon and C.I.A. Nominees

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
